title: CV Builder
description: Easily build cv without any isssues. Just fill the form and print the CV.
fullDescription: CV Builder is a user-friendly web application designed to help users effortlessly create professional CVs. With an intuitive interface, users simply need to fill out a form with their personal and professional details, and the app automatically generates a polished CV ready to print or save. Built with modern web technologies like HTML, Tailwind CSS, and React, CV Builder offers a seamless experience, ensuring that your CV is perfectly formatted without any hassle.

title: Calculator
description: Calculator for HSC Students focus on ict calculator
fullDescription: Calculator is a specialized tool designed specifically for HSC students, with a focus on ICT-related calculations. This web application provides a simple and intuitive interface to perform various calculations required for the HSC curriculum. Built with HTML, Tailwind CSS, and React, the calculator ensures quick and accurate results, making it an essential tool for students preparing for their exams.

title: Alpha-Clash-Pro
description: A desktop game for gain typing speed.
fullDescription: Alpha-Clash-Pro is an engaging desktop game designed to help users improve their typing speed. With a fun and competitive interface, players are challenged to type words quickly and accurately, helping them build typing proficiency over time. The game tracks progress, offering an interactive way to enhance typing skills. Developed with HTML, Tailwind CSS, and React, Alpha-Clash-Pro offers a smooth and immersive experience for players looking to boost their typing abilities.

title: Weather App
description: Showing live weather from this app.
fullDescription: Weather App is a simple yet powerful web application that provides live weather updates from around the world. Users can easily check the current weather conditions, including temperature, humidity, wind speed, and more, by simply entering the location. The app fetches real-time data and presents it in a user-friendly interface. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, this app delivers accurate weather information, making it a reliable tool for anyone looking to stay informed about the weather.
